alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Highland; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN CLERMONT, NORTHERN BROWN, SOUTHEASTERN WARREN, SOUTHWESTERN CLINTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 909 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Morrow to Milford, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Loveland, Milford, Georgetown, Blanchester, Amelia, Mount Orab, Bethel, Williamsburg, Batavia, Lynchburg, Morrow, Sardinia, Withamsville, Camp Dennison, Russell, South Lebanon, Woodville, Maineville and Owensville. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 29 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
